subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer crushed his Olympic gold-medal-winning doubles partner, Stanislas Wawrinka, to win an Australian Open tuneup event in Kooyong. Federer, who will try to equal Pete Sampras’s record of 14 Grand Slam titles when the Australian Open begins on Monday, broke Wawrinka’s serve three times in the first seven games and went on to beat him, 6-1, 6-3, in only 57 minutes.
